Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1980...
Injured on 6/13/1980 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 4/20/1983 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/10/1984...
Had first career hit on 4/25/1984, off George Popovich (NJ)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1986, winning 2 games with a 2.65 ERA...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Injured on 4/26/1989 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 4-5 weeks...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
